text:
Kaise hum exams mai sath clueless baithe rhte the hamesha yad rahega, Batti mai utna maza na ati tere bina
D-Bot ka sabse lucky banda tu hi hoga, Thug-Lyf vale chashme k sath end kri hai tune ye degree!
author: Sumukh  Bhagat

text: Antaragni ki after party mai tera vo pro move hamesha yad rahega jo tune extra shirt lai thi and beginning mai hi beer chug krte waqt tere upar hi sabse pehli ulti ayi thi XD
author: Sumukh  Bhagat

text:
Couldn't have asked for a better roomie! 
Itni vibe match shayad hi kisi se hui ho college mai
author: Sumukh  Bhagat

text:
Jai bhai...!
Campus mai tujh jaise bahut hi kam all-rounder log dekhe hai jo har field mai jhande gad chuke, matlab ek sem mai koi kaise hi itni sari chize handle kar sakta hai and vo bhi aise chapte hue sabme :O
And don't even get me started on how you guys single-handedly revolutionized Antaragni!

Bas ab aise hi apne sare jagah rishte maintain rakho fir apna milna julna to laga rahega ;)
author: Sumukh  Bhagat

text:
Although we've known each other since childhood I'll limit my memoir to our college times and totally not mention things like school days jab tumlog mera tiffin kha jate the sanskrit period mai :P

I remember being a shoulder to cry on after the first midsems (maine bola hi tha tab ye sab pe rona bekar hai), taking naps in classes and library, sharing secrets and najane kitne bar sath bahar kahi khana
Also that one time jab hum campus k bahar beer ki talaash mai gye the before movies XD

You've always been there for me during my ups and downs, kabhi nhi bhulunga mai ye
4 sal or sath mai pata nhi kaise nikal gye itne jaldi, khair abhi to or kafi lambi chalni h ye dosti. Kafi sare promises bhi to bache hai abhi pure karne ;)

I don't have any sisters but I think you're probably the closest I'll ever have <3
author: Sumukh  Bhagat

text:
Mr. BallsDeep bhai!
Sabse zada izzat h agar kisi "maggu" k liye iitk mai to vo tu hi h bhai (shabd thode different use kre honge over the years though XD)
Advice leni ho academic ya non-academic to bada reliable source raha hai hamesha tu. Helpful to starting se tha hi
And kaise tera test match dekhne k chakkar mai campus ana reh gya last sem yad rakhenge hum sab XD

Tere decisions ne tujhe hamesha bheed se alag standout karaya hai, continue rakhna isko
Kafi ummeede hai tujhse age, aise hi chapte rehna :)
author: Sumukh  Bhagat

text:
Gotiyaaaaa...!
Summers mai tune mere samne vala room lia tha and bas tabse mai passive weed smoker raha hu XD
Maza ati thi yar jab vo detective aunty as pas bhatakti thi tere room k spy krne k liye and kaise tera bong impound hogya tha unki vajah se hall office mai XD

Yar jate jate teri GPL bhi leli, sare sapne pure hogye iitk mai bas fir :')
author: Sumukh  Bhagat

text:
Sant Krishna Das
Nam jitna shareef hai banda utna hi harami, apne doho k liye kafi (in)famous
Chhaddar tan k sona koi inse hi seekhe, pure 4 sal aise hi nikale hai
author: Sumukh  Bhagat

text:
[Top Fan Badge]
Lucky to be your bhai, mere se bada supporter nhi hoga koi audience mai kabhi :P
Itna charisma or leadership qualities or kahi dekhne ko na mile shayad
College mai akar sabse zada grow to maybe tune hi kra hoga

The time we spent together partying, gossiping and playing together during the last few weeks will always be my one of the most cherished memories at IITK

Bas ab or bada admi ban kar hume yad rakhna, expecting great things from you!
author: Sumukh  Bhagat

text:
Salam Co-Head bhai jan!
1st year ki trip se lekar sath mai ShowM mai sath kam krne tak ka lamba safar has been most memorable
Bas aise hi hamesha cool bane rehna, jachta hai tujhpe :)
author: Sumukh  Bhagat

text:
The owner of our D-Bot ka Adda, itni memories or kahi nhi bani hogi college mai! 
Kafi generous or sabse chill lounda, always ready to party! Asli Mechanical Engineer 
Sath mai courses krne se lekar PUBG kharidne tk kafi memories banai h apan ne
author: Sumukh  Bhagat

text:
Kuch log kuch logo ko jante hai,
Kuch log bahut logo ko jante hai,
Lekin Pandey Ji sab logo ko jante hai

One of the most genuine and pure in heart person at IITK
Kitna masoom sa aya tha 4 sal pehle or humne kaise ise 'cough syrup' premi bana k bheja vapas
author: Sumukh  Bhagat

text:
Bada hi harami dost raha hai tu :/
But jabtak campus mai raha hai tune sath kafi dia hai, bas ab apne vo 3rd sem vale self ko control dede and chapde age life mai
Tu hume bhul gya ho sakta hai but hum nhi bhulenge tujhe :P
author: Sumukh  Bhagat

text:
Kuch log pets adopt krte hai to kuch log bacche, but hamare Mech Papa ne pure D-Bot ki adult population ko pala posa hai 4 sal
First sem mai TA se le kar last sem mai ulti karane tak, bahut sahyog raha hai. 
Isse zada caring banda koi nahi milega pure IITK mai, or sanskari to itne ki meri Nani ji bhi impress hogyi
author: Sumukh  Bhagat

text:
Meri degree pe mera nam zarur likha hoga but actual kam to pura inka tha
Life mai itna talented or selfless banda nhi dekha! Bhai or pehle mil jata

4 sal mai sabse zada time spend kra hoga sath mai, har possible cheez jo engineering life mai karte vo humne kar rkhi hogi sath
College ki meri har dusri memory mai tu zarur hoga but best to sath din-rat games khelne ki or last moment pe acads ka kam krne ki rhengi

Although tum to thehre pardesi but sath bahut nibhaya, and abhi to or kafi nibhana hai age
author: Sumukh  Bhagat

text:
IITK mai bhai mile to aisa, jidhar bhi gya udhar nam kar rakha hai
4 sal mai duniya bhale hi idhar se udhar hogyi ho but ye janab zara bhi change nhi hue, shuru se kafi chapu or mehnati
Bhale hi end end mai rhta dusre wing mai tha but dil se D-Bot vala hi rha hamesha
author: Sumukh  Bhagat

text:
Hitler to yuhi badnam hai, asli chamber to bhai ka room hua krta tha
DOTA samajh to zada ata nhi abhi bhi but ise khelte dekhne k liye always ready
Kafi frank banda, asli advice milti thi hamesha 
2nd year k summer tere bina mazedar nhi rhta, specially apna vo course XD
author: Sumukh  Bhagat

text:
Haramipun or talent k ek anokhe mixture se bana hai apna ye lounda
Purano ki mane to inki body internally intoxicated rhti hai, party mai jan dal dete tha apna yar is personality se
Najane kitne logo ko humne sath mai judge krke mazak udaya hoga
author: Sumukh  Bhagat

text:
Miss karunga apne vo ek dusre ko randomly gali dene vale tradition ko

Also, 10 packet bhujia bhijwa de bhai
author: Sumukh  Bhagat

text:
Hamare pure D-Bot ka local guardian :)
Bhai ka itna strong determination hai jidhar dal dete bas mano chap gya, pehle apne Dance club ko new heights pe legye fir ab dual mai acads chap rahe
D-Bot ki shaan hai bhai apna!

Abhi to apni trips krna bacha hai settle hone k bad, also teri shadi (hum sabka iitk reunion) ka wait hai
author: Sumukh  Bhagat

text:
Yadu bhai...! Najane kitne bar tera room number bata k mai H12 mai entry leta rha hu
Yad rahenge yar apne vo planning and execution vale Antaragni k din and uske bad ki parties :')

Also, Gupta ko kri burger king vali payment vala secret will always be safe with me ;)
Ab bas dekhna hai pehle haircut kon karvata hai apne mai se :P
author: Sumukh  Bhagat
